short_desc: Online information about legally changing name and legally changing gender
description: Provides online information and forms needed to apply for legal name change and/or change of gender. Name change information is available for both adults and for children. Describes step-by-step process (forms, filing, what will be needed on court date) and answers Frequently Asked Questions.Initial filing fee for Petition for a Decree of Change of Name or Gender: $350. Fee waiver may be applied for.
